Detailed Description

at every pixel, replaces its value (val) by (A - val)

Author:

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.Inverter.invert ( final LatLonGrid  input  )  

00025                                                     {
00026         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00027         int[][] outData = output.getData();
00028         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00029         for (int i=0; i < output.getNumLat(); ++i){
00030             for (int j=0; j < output.getNumLon(); ++j){
00031                 if ( inData[i][j] != input.getMissing() ){
00032                     outData[i][j] = A - inData[i][j];
00033                 }
00034             }
00035         }
00036         return output;
00037     }
